subject: Drift report (current)
content: Docs/onboarding updated: AI_START_HERE, DOC_INDEX, SYSTEM_STATE now point to tasks.db + messaging CLI. Remaining drift: missing docs/EXTERNAL_AGENTS_PIPELINE.md and docs/PROMPTS_WORKFLOWS.md; tasks.json references in src/agentic/core/config.py, src/dashboard/app.py, scripts/run_production.py, Knowledge/Tasks/README.md; artifact protocol mismatch (docs require PLAN/RUNBOOK/EVIDENCE/CHANGES/META but artifact_generator only SUMMARY.md); sentinel gates missing hardcoded path + forbidden dirs; .YBIS_Dev paths referenced in docs/AGENTS_ONBOARDING.md and governance docs; constitution path mismatch in aider_executor_enhanced.py; system_health_check imports outdated plugins.
